attributes.action: ask Joan Dairy Queen to host the bingo at Redstar (formerly the Father Redcap) Sunday 4th May
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joan is a legendary night club drag host and promoter in South London, famous for her legendary antics at Marvellous at Substatin South in Brixton. We want Joan to host bingo and Kareoke with DJs Felix and Martin Confusion at Patrick Lilley's one off reunion party on Sunday 4th May 2008.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
